lead_paragraph: Middlesbrough have signed winger Adama Traore for an undisclosed fee from second-tier Aston Villa on a four-year contract, the Premier League club announced on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Middlesbrough Sign Winger Traore From Aston Villa
headline.main: Middlesbrough Sign Winger Traore From Aston Villa

snippet: Middlesbrough have signed winger Adama Traore for an undisclosed fee from second-tier Aston Villa on a four-year contract, the Premier League club announced on Wednesday....
